column1: on the pads, but Wade can't get hold of the flick
banged in short and outside off, Wade takes it on with a hook and splices it away over short fine leg, gets it away to the left of deep square leg
punched away towards point off the back foot
just short of a good length and outside off, Wade picks it up and muscles it away over midwicket. Bam! Hits the rope on the flush. Six it is
back of a length and swerving away outside off, Wade aims to waft it to the leg side... and misses
Richardson finds some away swing, poked towards point
overpitched and outside off, driven through the line to the right of mid-off for a first-ball four
slower ball? Mighty full on off, jabbed to mid-off
sliced off an outside edge... but does not carry to point
on the pads, clipped away to the right of short fine leg for four. Easy peasy
Dropped by the bowler. Full on middle, stops on Short, he chips a drive to the left of the bowler. He shells a tough catch
shovelled away between midwicket and mid-on. Finch chases hard from mid-off and hunts the ball down
slower ball from Richardson, 122ks, Wade is early into the pull and misses
another slower one, from the back of the hand, nudged to the leg side
Short rides this short ball from outside off to deep third man
overpitched and outside off, drilled through extra-cover for four. Another change-up from Richardson, Wade adjusted, and cracked it away
hip-high short ball outside off, smoked over the midwicket fence. Right off the meat of the bat
beamer, dragged to midwicket. Well above the waist, no-ball called
free-hit: full-toss outside off, carved up and over backward point for another four
flatter and on the pads, picked away to the leg side
Wade gives himself some room and flashes it back to Nabi
Wade backs away, again. Nabi chases him and hacks it away to long-on off the inside half
whipped off the pads to deep midwicket
shuffles across off, Nabi held this offbreak back outside off, paddled to short fine leg
on the pads again, clipped straight to square leg this time
slower one, 98ks, dips on the pads, worked through the leg side
follows the slower ball with a quick yorker, jammed away past the left of the bowler
slower short ball outside off, Short sizes it up and smacks a pull over backward square leg for six
heaved across the line to deep midwicket
pitched up and outside off, Wade leans back and swings it away straight of mid-on
down the track and nicked away towards point
flighted on middle and leg, played back to Nabi
Wade jumps across off and slog-sweeps a full-toss over the midwicket boundary
Wade gives himself some room and scythes it away to extra-cover
short on middle, no turn, punched to covers
chopped from the stumps to short third man
low full-toss on leg stump, bunted away to wide long-on
near yorker outside off, jabbed to the covers
slower ball, on a length and outside off, forced away to wide long-off
back of a length and outside off, Wade swings hard, loses his shape, and collects fresh air
slower short ball outside off, ignored
overpitched and outside off, crunnnnnnnched away to the right of long-off for four
full and wide outside off, squeezed behind point for another four
very full on leg stump, jammed through the midwicket region
short and skids on outside off, chopped off the back foot to backward point
tossed up and spins back in, Wade drops down to one knee and slog-sweeps it into the grass banks beyond midwicket. He raises a 27-ball fifty
half-volley outside off, driven through the line to sweeper cover

Harper appeals for caught behind. Boyce isn't interested. Googly, short and turns away outside off, Short slashes. Harper takes it on the second attempt, not given out. Not sure if there was a tickle on that
driven down to long-off
slower ball outside off, forced down to long-off
down the track, reaches out for the wide full-toss, and carves it away over short third man

114ks slower ball outside off from Richardson. Wade has to manufacture all the pace. He can only drag it off the toe end to Cooper at deep midwicket. The outfielder takes his eyes off the ball but somehow the ball sticks in his hands
shortish and outside off, punched away to sweeper cover
That's a gift from Short. Full-toss, angling across off, Short deliberately opens the face and slices it straight to Tremain at backward point. Just like that, the two set batsmen are gone
on a length and outside off, opens the face and steers a single to sweeper cover
full-toss outside off, stabbed back to the bowler
nudged through midwicket off the front foot
full and outside off, eased down to long-off
McDermott goes on the back foot and punches to sweeper cover
back of a length and spins away outside off, slapped down to long-off
full-toss on middle, driven down to long-on
Jewell steps away outside leg, the bowler follows him, and punches away to long-on
tossed outside off, worked away towards wide long-on off the front foot
short and slides on outside off, chopped to backward point
Jewell holes out to backward point. He shimmies away, Nabi pushes it faster and wide outside off. Sliced away into the hands of Tremain. Hurricanes have lost three quick wickets
tossed outside off, down the track and drilled back to Nabi, the force of the shot ensures the ball bursts through his hands
on a length and drifts away, tapped to the covers
short and at the body, cramps Bailey for room. Flapped away towards wide long-on
back of a length and on the hips, shuffles across and tickles the ball away behind square. Off the pad
on the hips, tucked away to deep square
shuffles across and flicks between deep square leg and long leg for four. Precise placement
slower dipper, full-toss on middle, glanced away to long leg
back of a length on off, punched back
flatter around off, pushes it towards long-off from the crease
tossed up this time, a touch fuller around off, swipes it towards long-on
length around off, waits for it to arrive before punching it towards sweeper cover
fired in around off, digs it towards long-off
length around off, pushes it towards cover
a full toss on middle and leg, works it with a straight bat towards wide long-on, sprints back for the second
length around off, a mistimed pull towards deep midwicket
closes the face and drives a single down to long-on
short and outside off, tugged away to deep midwicket
dug in short and outside off, McDermott rises on top of the bounce and scythes it away over point for four
slower short ball outside off, adjusts and pulls to deep midwicket
whipped away to deep midwicket
slower ball on off, forced away to deep midwicket
slapped away to deep cover
Gurney's change-up gets Bailey. Slower full ball outside off, Bailey can only slice it away to Finch at extra-cover. Gurney has been very impressive with his pace variations
back of a length and outside off, guided to the covers
slower ball outside off, glanced behind square
full-toss outside off, eased to sweeper cover
dangled up full and wide outside off, driven on the up to sweeper cover with the break
back of a length and breaks away outside off, punched up to cover
flatter and spins away outside off, forced away to sweeper cover for one
flighted and spins away outside off, drilled to the off-side sweeper
off-side wide
short and turns away outside off, smeared away to sweeper cover
full and wide outside off, Milenko reaches out for the ball and scythes it up and over sweeper cover for a flat six
backs away and punches a single down the ground
slower short ball outside off, Milenko swings early...and misses
carved away wide of backward point for four
on a length and outside off, Milenko runs down the track, again, and slices the ball up and over backward point for yet another four
full-toss outside off, spanked away to the right of sweeper cover to cap a 20-run over
full-toss outside off, jammed away to the covers
off-side wide
on a length and outside off, hoicked away in the air, but can't clear the outfielder. Tugs a slower ball to Richardson at deep square leg
full-toss outside off, spliced down to long-off. Archer hares back for the second
low full-toss outside off, slapped down to long-off
Archer uses his feet and wafts a slower cutter to the leg side off an inside edge
full and outside off, stabbed back down the ground
yorker outside off, dug out to long-off
leg-side wide
slower ball one outside off, slugged away to deep midwicket's left

muffled appeal for caught behind! Harper and Christian are celebrating. Archer, however, stands his ground. Slower offcutter, nips down the leg side, Archer looks to flick it away, ends up tickling it behind to the keeper who completes an excellent diving catch. He takes the ball inches from the ground. The TV umpire takes a long time to give it out
full and outside off, driven through the line to long-off
low full-toss dips at off, clipped away to deep midwicket
full-toss on middle, flicked away to the leg side for two
slower ball, running away outside off, Rose reaches out for the ball and does not make contact
full-toss outside off, jumps across off and pulls it away over backward square leg. Beamer above the waist
overpitched and outside off, this has been flat-batted away straight to mid-off

McDermott jumps across off, Gurney follows him with a full-toss. McDermott searches for a scoop and ends up hitting it onto his own helmet off the face of the bat. Man down. McDermott needs some medical attention.
Smoked over the midwicket boundary. McDermott shakes off the blow to the helmet and smites a six. Short and outside off, slower ball, he winds up and dispatches it away
full-toss dangled wide past the tramline, off-side wide
full and running away outside off, slower cutter, swings and misses. Harper who is keeping with just one glove makes the collection
pitched up and outside off, muscled away to wide long-on for a double
Meredith marks his return with a 144ks yorker that swings away so very late. Harris is beaten for pace and can't jab his bat down
splice-jarring length, 143ks, short and outside off, jabbed away towards mid-on this time
on a length and around off, the bottom hand flies off the bat, but Harris still shovels the ball away towards deep square leg
back of a length, angling in, and moving away outside off. Left alone. But Meredith has overstepped
really full and shoved down the leg side, beats the diving keeper, and rolls away to the fine-leg fence
full-toss on middle, 147ks, Finch is beaten for pace. He winds up dragging a thick inside edge past leg stump for four. Meredith has overstepped once again
free-hit: full-toss wide outside off, crunched away over mid-off to the boundary. Big no-ball from Meredith - third of the over

Finch flits around in the crease, 144.1ks, Meredith hits a hard length on leg stump and cramps the batsman for room. He digs it out to the leg side and hares across to the other end. Legal ball. Relief for the bowler

really full and outside off, played down to deep third man with a slicing finish. There's a mix-up between the wickets, but the throw is to the wrong end: keeper. Should've been thrown to the non-striker's end
very full and angling down the leg side, tickled away fine past the diving keeper for four. No bat, gives as leg byes. Phew, 23 off that opening over from Meredith
pitched up and outside off, driven on the up to mid-off
really full on middle and leg, clipped away to deep midwicket
banged in short and outside off, sticks in the pitch, Finch checks his pull and flaps the ball towards mid-on
back of a length and just a shade outside off, Finch gets on top of the bounce and punches it to extra-cover
back of a length and wider outside off, slower ball at 125ks, Finch delays his punch and bunts this legcutter to cover-point
slower short ball outside off, Finch swings it away tennis-style to wide long-on
very full and angling in at middle and leg, clipped away to midwicket
flighted on off, Finch dashes down the track, reaches the pitch of the ball and lofts it straight over the head of Rose. Such a clean strike from Finch
darted faster and flatter on middle, Finch gives himself some room and drags it away over midwicket. Not middled. Off the inside half, but Finch won't mind
Finch backs away once again, arm ball at 103ks chases Finch, jammed away to the leg side
Finch gives himself room and slaps a single to the left of Bailey at mid-off
107.7ks low full-toss, too full for the sweep, off the pad and rolls away to short fine leg
back of a length on middle and leg, possibly a slower ball, Finch camps in the crease and knocks the ball away to square leg
back of a length and outside off, 130ks, Harris has a crack at it. Punched on the up but straight to Short at square point. Three men close in on the off side and Harris picks out Short
back of a length and angling in at the top of off stump, punchily defended back to the bowler. Top lines and lengths from Archer
Dropped by Archer. Harper dashes down the track, Archer slips in a legcutter, drilled back to him, he drops an overhead catch in his followthrough
slower ball outside off, Finch drops his gloves on it. Wide called, though
slower short ball, floated in on middle, 120.6ks, glanced away behind square on the leg side
short on middle, Harper gets inside the line and pulls the ball firmly to deep square leg
back of a length and angling into middle and leg, nearly 150ks, Finch hops and works it away behind square on the leg side
back of a length and whanged down the leg side, another wide from Meredith. He continues to struggle with his lines and lengths
short and skids back in at 148ks, beats Finch for pace, pings the thigh pad and wanders away to point
back of a length and angling into middle and leg, Finch hops, skips, and tucks the ball away towards square leg
yorker, swings in at off, 148ks, squirted out to extra-cover
short and outside off, Finch rides the bounce and cuts it away behind point for four. Milkenko dives in vain and lands awkwardly on his shoulder
hip-high short ball outside off, 148ks, Finch takes it on and nails a pull over midwicket. Thumped away by the Renegades captain. Meredith's night goes for bad to worse
pitched up and outside off, Harper shuffles away and slashes an outside edge to the right of the keeper
back of a length and bounces over middle as Harper jumps outside leg and does not make contact with the ball
beamer, spliced away to extra-cover. Well above the waistline
yorker outside off, Finch swings for the hills and misses
full and angling into middle, Finch whips it away with the wrists to deep midwicket
scythed away over extra-cover. Harper shimmies outside leg, Moody goes too full and chases the batsman. Pumped up and over the infield
Dropped at backward point. It was a tough chance. Short and wide outside off, Harper carves it away in the air and gets away
short and slides in on middle, 94.2ks, hangs back and punches to deep midwicket
wrong'un, short on off, 97ks, punched off the back foot to long-on
skids on off, goes on the back foot and jabs a punch to cover
slider on middle, 93ks, leans back and punches the ball away to the covers

Qais strikes in his first over on BBL debut. No somersaults or ninja kicks. Subdued celebrations from the teenager. It wasn't a great ball, though. But Qais won't mind. Dragged down on middle, right up in the slot for the pull. Finch does not get all of it and holes out to deep midwicket
Qais draws an appeal for lbw, not given. Think this was the googly, swerving in and beating the sweep. Was it heading down the leg side?
short of a length and skids on outside off, cut away to the left of sweeper cover
seam-up, short and outside off, another batsman holes out to deep midwicket. This half-tracker has been pulled straight to McDermott. Long boundary, but that should've been put away
wrong'un, short and outside off, swatted off the back foot to wide long-on
full and straight, knocked away through square leg
skidding in to catch the pad, but this clearly heading down the leg side
another googly outside off, forced to deep midwicket off the back foot
low full-toss on middle, reverse-paddled away to short third man
flat and on leg stump, driven right back to the bowler. Qais drops a tough return catch
wrong'un, fizzes back in, takes the inside edge and wanders away to the leg side
short and turns away outside off, goes on the back foot and punches the ball away to long-off
slower through the air and breaks away outside off, punched through the line to extra-cover for one
fired into leg stump, deflected away to short fine leg. Just four runs off the over, excellent work from Qais

Chopped straight to short third man. The Renegades are losing their way. Shorter and outside off, Nabi can't get on top of the ball as he looks to cut it away. The wristspinners are doing the job for the Hurricanes
jumps from a back of a length and breaks back in, defended to cover
floated up on leg stump, driven right back to the bowler
sliced off the outside edge but can't beat short third man
nice and full, turns back in to ping the pad as Christian plays all around it and misses
poked back to the right of Short to close out the over
flighted and spins away outside off, lifted straight of wide long-off for four. Doolan, subbing for Milenko, goes straighter after that hit
slider on middle, swept to short fine leg
full and spins away outside off, flayed away to the left of sweeper cover
back of a length and turns away outside off, punched on the up to sweeper cover
short on middle and leg, tucked to long leg
quick fizzer outside off, chopped away fine of short third man
tossed up on the pads, swept away to the right of deep square leg
Rose hits a hard length outside off, chopped to backward point
Christian shimmies out, dragged shorter on middle, stroked back to the left of Rose
back of a length and darted into the hips, nudged away square of short fine leg
looped up outside off, Rose beats the reverse-sweep, the keeper is beaten as well and concedes byes
slides on just a shade outside off, chipped away into the gap at midwicket for a couple
short and outside off, gets on top of the bounce, and steers it away to deep third man
full on middle, lashed away to the left of mid-off for one
short, wide, smeared away straight to Bailey at backward point
slower ball drifted past the tramline. Off-side wide
full-toss on off, punched away in the gap between mid-off and extra-cover
slower legcutter outside off, cracked away towards sweeper
yorker on leg stump, squeezed to long-on
shorter and outside off, chopped to backward point
on a length and on off stump, dragged away in the air to long-on
short on the hips, tucked to deep square leg off the back foot
short and skids on outside off, chopped off the back foot to point
chipped down the ground off a leading edge but does not carry to long-off
full and on middle and leg, down the track and chips a drive to long-on this time
back of a length and slanting into leg stump, 147.4ks, clubbed away to deep midwicket
back of a length and angling into the hips, pulled away to long leg, where Qais tides up
short of a length and banged down the leg side for a wide
chest-high short ball on off, 147ks, angling into the body of Christian. He smites a pull over the short square boundary
short and outside off, flayed away to midwicket's right
lifter outside off, defeats the hook and sails through to Wade. Too high and another wide from Meredith
full-toss angling down the leg side for another wide. Meredith is spraying it all around the shop
Dropped by Qais at fine leg. Banged in short and angling in on middle, splices a hook, and Qais drops a sitter in the outfield
banged in short on middle, 141ks, angling into the body of Christian. He aims a hook and ends up gloving it behind to the keeper
short and slides away outside off, beaten
dropped short and outside off, cracked off the back foot to backward point
chopped from off stump to point
short on leg stump, pulled in the air, one bounce to deep square leg
full and outside off, opens up his hips and drives it away to sweeper cover
pushed through on off, mowed away into the crowd. Fiercely slog-swept over midwicket by Cooper
slower legcutter outside off, dupes Harvery. He swings early and collects fresh air
back of a length and snaking in at 144ks, beats Harvey for pace now as he is late onto the leg-side slog
full and angling into the pads, 144.5ks, whipped away to deep square leg
slower ball outside off, Cooper jumps across off stump and swats a pull away behind square on the leg side for four. Struck away square of short fine leg
slower legcutter outside off, 112.8ks, beats the swinging batsman
on a length and outside off, stabbed away to the leg side off the inside half
dragged down outside off, Cooper picks up the length early and slugs a pull over square leg. Put away
full-toss outside off, slapped in the air, straight to Bailey at extra-cover. Qais is mobbed by his team-mates. Cooper stayed deep in the crease but can't clear Bailey
fuller and outside off, driven through the line, along the ground to Bailey
shorter and breaks away outside off, chopped to point off the back foot
rank long-hop outside off, was it the googly gone wrong? Harvey lays into it and muscles it over the midwicket boundary
tossed up on the leg stump, Harvery drops down to one knee and launches a slog-sweep over the square boundary on the leg side. Clattered away into the crowd
144ks full-toss outside off, toe-ended away. The keeper throws himself to his right to stop the ball
back of a length and outside off, Harvey stays leg-side of the ball and punches it in the air. Skies it. Drops down to Bailey moving back from extra-cover
full on leg stump, swiped away to deep midwicket
on a length and outside off, smeared away to sweeper cover for a double
wide yorker from Archer, the batsman can't touch it
middle-stump yorker, squirted away to the left of Bailey at extra-cover. Excellent over from Archer
low full-toss on leg stump, 140.8ks, hit down to long-on
Boyce gives himself some room, Moody follows him with a yorker, Boyce can't touch it

Chipped to Doolan at mid-off. Boyce jumps outside leg again, Moody chases him with a near yorker. Mighty full and cramps the batsman for room, drawing a leading edge, which is snaffled by the sub fielder
full-toss on off, slapped away to mid-off
bumper down the leg side following the moving batsman, wide. Wade is furious with Moody
yorker on off, dug out to the left of sweeper cover
full and wide outside off, Richardson reaches out for the ball and carves it away to deep third man
